div.h3: FFA Plant Sale on May 2-By Appointment Only
div.p: The Weston FFA will hold it's annual Plant Sale on May 2 from 8am to 4pm, all those planning to attend MUST sign up for an appointment.

a.title: Read More on 'FFA Plant Sale on May 2-By Appointment Only'
a.aria-label: Read More on 'FFA Plant Sale on May 2-By Appointment Only'
a.alt: Read More on 'FFA Plant Sale on May 2-By Appointment Only'

div.h3: Attend the Weston School Board Meeting via Zoom
div.p: Weston School Board will be Meeting on Monday, April 20 at 5:00 p.m. All those who would like to attend may do so through Zoom. To sign up for a Zoom invit...

a.title: Read More on 'Attend the Weston School Board Meeting via Zoom'
a.aria-label: Read More on 'Attend the Weston School Board Meeting via Zoom'
a.alt: Read More on 'Attend the Weston School Board Meeting via Zoom'

p.span: Weston’s annual FFA Awards & Recognition Banquet was originally scheduled for this evening. Students have worked so hard and learned so many valuable skills this past year, we would like to celebrate...
